document_data.mainbody:
Marshal Kulwarth was a scarred barbarian Zhentilar officer in the 1370s DR.
In 1374 DR, during the Cormanthor War, Kulwarth was the aide-de-camp of the castellan Scyllua Darkhope. With Kulwarths help, Scyllua won a great battle against the Red Plumes.
Later, they were besieging Hillsfar when Kulwarth informed Scyllua that Fzoul Chembryl needed to see her.
